report.title: Tonic-Clonic Seizure
report.author: Neveragain
report.bodytext: /n /n /n I had neck pain from a car accident a few weeks ago and the Dr gave me a script for Ultram - 50mg with the instructions take 2 every 6 hours. /n /n I 2 pills twice daily for 9 days, usually with breakfast. On day 10 I was late for work so I took them with my Zoloft (Same Dr gave me the script) and a cup of coffee. /n /n Two hours later I was at work enjoying my buzz at work and the next thing I knew I was being held down and told paramedics were coming. /n /n I had a tonic-clonic seizure at work. If you're not sure what that is picture: eyes rolling back, legs kicking, arms jerking, spitting, pissing pants etc. /n /n 3 days later I am still having blurred vision, muscle tremors, anxiety & an overall shitty feeling. /n /n I went to raves for a period of about 2 years, 5 years ago, during which I did mostly ecstasy and amphetamines -but I've tried almost everything I could get my hands on at the time. Never had a reaction like this before, no family history of seizures either.
